column2: Get some gold from the blessed Coffer
Which of your artifacts would you like to give to [From.GetFirstName] [From.GetOnlyDynastyName]?
Which artifacts would you like to confiscate from [From.GetFirstName] [From.GetOnlyDynastyName]?
This allows me to gift unwanted artifacts to vassals and courtiers, who would certainly be most grateful for the gift.
The recent passage of [From.GetFirstName] [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] into Aetherius has caused us to inherit some of their powerful artifacts.
